Container.Name: kitchen-frontend
Container.Overview:
Kitchen - Modern meal planning and recipe management application with Discord notifications.
SETUP INSTRUCTIONS (Install in this order): 1. Create network: docker network create kitchen-network 2. Install and start: kitchen-postgres 3. Install and start: kitchen-backend (configure all required environment variables) 4. Install and start: kitchen-frontend (this container)
FEATURES: - Recipe management with automatic import from URLs - Meal planning with rotating weekly templates - Automatic grocery list generation - Discord notifications for meal plans - Ingredient normalization and mapping - Multi-user support with authentication
After starting all three containers, access the web interface at http://[IP]:[PORT]
Default demo user (if backend is in development mode): Username: demo Password: demo1234
Container.Requires: kitchen-postgres and kitchen-backend must be running first!
